"Fordran Horn":
"I really screwed up. After I finally got my hands on
a Nordiran, I went and threw away its
horns by mistake. But I didn't know you could make
a rare and exotic seasoning by crushing them into
a powder! Even worse, I had to pay a trash hauler to
take them away! I was too shocked to even cry when
I realized what I'd done. But no use crying over lost
Nordiran horns. I'll just forget that, and ask you to go
get me some Fordran horn. Would you please?
*Target: Fordrans level 24 or higher"

"やっちゃった……せっかく調達した
ノーディランの角、うっかり捨てちゃったの。
まさかあの角を粉末にすると、めずらしい
調味料になるなんて知らなかったのよー！
わざわざ廃棄物処理業者に処分料まで
支払ったんだから、泣くに泣けないわ……
まぁ、泣いてたって戻ってこないし
こうなったら、ノーディランの事は忘れて
フォードランの角の調達をお願いするわ！
※Lv.24～のフォードランが対象"
